00029 #include "BKE_object.h"

00031 #include "TransformWriter.h"

00033 #include "BLI_math.h"
00034 
00035 void TransformWriter::add_node_transform(COLLADASW::Node& node, float mat[][4], float parent_mat[][4])
00036 {
00037     float loc[3], rot[3], scale[3];
00038     float local[4][4];
00039 
00040     if (parent_mat) {
00041         float invpar[4][4];
00042         invert_m4_m4(invpar, parent_mat);
00043         mult_m4_m4m4(local, invpar, mat);
00044     }
00045     else {
00046         copy_m4_m4(local, mat);
00047     }
00048 
00049     double dmat[4][4];
00050     UnitConverter* converter = new UnitConverter();
00051     converter->mat4_to_dae_double(dmat,local);
00052 
00053     TransformBase::decompose(local, loc, rot, NULL, scale);
00054     if ( node.getType() == COLLADASW::Node::JOINT)
00055         node.addMatrix("transform",dmat);
00056     else
00057         add_transform(node, loc, rot, scale);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void TransformWriter::add_node_transform_ob(COLLADASW::Node& node, Object *ob)
00061 {
00062     /*
00063     float rot[3], loc[3], scale[3];
00064 
00065     if (ob->parent) {
00066         float C[4][4], tmat[4][4], imat[4][4], mat[4][4];
00067 
00068         // factor out scale from obmat
00069 
00070         copy_v3_v3(scale, ob->size);
00071 
00072         ob->size[0] = ob->size[1] = ob->size[2] = 1.0f;
00073         object_to_mat4(ob, C);
00074         copy_v3_v3(ob->size, scale);
00075 
00076         mul_serie_m4(tmat, ob->parent->obmat, ob->parentinv, C, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00077 
00078         // calculate local mat
00079 
00080         invert_m4_m4(imat, ob->parent->obmat);
00081         mult_m4_m4m4(mat, imat, tmat);
00082 
00083         // done
00084 
00085         mat4_to_eul(rot, mat);
00086         copy_v3_v3(loc, mat[3]);
00087     }
00088     else {
00089         copy_v3_v3(loc, ob->loc);
00090         copy_v3_v3(rot, ob->rot);
00091         copy_v3_v3(scale, ob->size);
00092     }
00093 
00094     add_transform(node, loc, rot, scale);
00095     */
00096 
00097     /* Using parentinv should allow use of existing curves */
00098     if (ob->parent)
00099     {
00100         // If parentinv is identity don't add it.
00101         bool add_parinv = false;
00102 
00103         for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i)
00104         {
00105             float f = (i % 4 == i / 4) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
00106             add_parinv |= (ob->parentinv[i % 4][i / 4] != f);
00107         }
00108 
00109         if (add_parinv)
00110         {
00111             double dmat[4][4];
00112             UnitConverter converter;
00113             converter.mat4_to_dae_double(dmat, ob->parentinv);
00114             node.addMatrix("parentinverse", dmat);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 
00118     add_transform(node, ob->loc, ob->rot, ob->size);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void TransformWriter::add_node_transform_identity(COLLADASW::Node& node)
00122 {
00123     float loc[] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, scale[] = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f}, rot[] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00124     add_transform(node, loc, rot, scale);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void TransformWriter::add_transform(COLLADASW::Node& node, float loc[3], float rot[3], float scale[3])
00128 {
00129     node.addTranslate("location", loc[0], loc[1], loc[2]);
00130     /*node.addRotateZ("rotationZ", COLLADABU::Math::Utils::radToDegF(rot[2]));
00131     node.addRotateY("rotationY", COLLADABU::Math::Utils::radToDegF(rot[1]));
00132     node.addRotateX("rotationX", COLLADABU::Math::Utils::radToDegF(rot[0]));*/
00133     node.addRotateZ("rotationZ", RAD2DEGF(rot[2]));
00134     node.addRotateY("rotationY", RAD2DEGF(rot[1]));
00135     node.addRotateX("rotationX", RAD2DEGF(rot[0]));
00136 
00137     node.addScale("scale", scale[0], scale[1], scale[2]);
00138 }
